text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson Reminder, @realDonaldTrump doesn’t care if you get sick and/or die.  He signed an executive order to compel meat production companies to remain open, but tight conditions in these plants make workers particularly susceptible to the virus. https://t.co/239X1e7rpN
